summary: These are three different sounds for bows, three sounds to pull bowstringand three sounds for shooting.
descriptionHtml:
Hi all, these are three different sounds for bows, three sounds to pull bowstring and three sounds for shooting.

Videos here:
http://youtu.be/xHqWjsFyOCE
http://youtu.be/NkybuihigIg
http://youtu.be/Wc75jmkqRuQ

Settings for all sounds are:
32.000 Hz 16 bit Mono.
I'm using 44.100 Hz and 16 bit in my PC audio settings and the mod is 100% stable.

Install with NMM or download it manually and copy the contents of the Skyrim Bow Sounds.rar file in your skyrim installation folder. But I always recommend using NMM.

Uninstall: Use NMM or deletes the contents of the Skyrim Bow Sounds.rar file of your skyrim data folder.

Enjoy it.
author: Alrock10
